function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contact surfaces such as tables, chairs, doorknobs, handrails, and buttons can act as vectors for contagious diseases due to frequent touching.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among employees and workers.","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization of contact surfaces, installation of hand washing facilities, and implementation of touch-free delivery systems.","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, touch-free delivery systems.","People":"Workers, employees, delivery drivers.","Owner":"Employers, management."},{"Description":"Virus can stay on surfaces for days, posing a risk of transmission through contaminated materials and equipment.","Impact":"Potential exposure to the virus and risk of transmission among employees and workers.","Mitigation":"Developing special systems for material and equipment deliveries, coordinating with suppliers for touch-free deliveries, dedicating limited access areas, and sanitizing materials and equipment.","Technologies":"Touch-free delivery systems, sanitization equipment.","People":"Workers, employees, delivery drivers.","Owner":"Employers, management."},{"Description":"Use of paper in the delivery process may pose a risk of virus transmission, especially if electronic signatures and receipts are not an option.","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through paper-based delivery processes.","Mitigation":"Placing paper in quarantine boxes, implementing touch-free delivery systems, and exploring electronic signatures and receipts.","Technologies":"Quarantine boxes, touch-free delivery systems, electronic signature systems.","People":"Workers, employees, delivery drivers.","Owner":"Employers, management."}]}
